Description: Ostracon, fragment of the handle of a light-brown pottery wine-jar, the exterior is covered with a cream-coloured slip, the top of the handle is impressed with a stamp, comprising a double oval containing the hieroglyphic formula - ' house of Aten in Iunu (= Heliopolis)'.
Bibliographic references: Trismegistos / An interdisciplinary portal of papyrological and epigraphic resources (393421) (http://www.trismegistos.org/text/393421)
Associated places: Named in inscription: House of the Aten at Iunu (historic)
